feature_bullets: 【Digital Dimmer Switch】[1%-100% Dimming & Voice Control]: This smart dimmer switch can adjust brightness level from 1%-100% with Alexa voice assistants, it can easily control dimmable light by sending voice commands like“Alexa, dim the living room light to 30%.” Brightness memory function is available for the wifi light switch to remember the last light setting when powered off.

【 Universal Compatibility 】Tested on 1,200s of bulbs and dozens of brands for flicker-free dimming. For list of recommended bulbs view "Compatibility Chart". Works with dimmable LED/CFL rated up to 200W, Incandescent & Halogen light lamp bulbs rated up to 600W on the market. Works with 98% of dimmable LED, CFL, Incandescent & Halogen light lamp bulbs.

【Light Effect Settings】: Set lights to automatically adjust with seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; enable smart away to randomly turn your lights on/off to look like you’re home even if you’re away
【WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL】: For added convenience, use with wireless Pico remote (BY-06) to turn your lights on, off, or dim and brighten with the touch of a button from anywhere in the home
【WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL】: For added convenience, use with wireless Pico remote (BY-06) to turn your lights on, off, or dim and brighten with the touch of a button from anywhere in the home

【EASY 3-WAY SETUP】: Create a 3-way by mounting wireless Pico remote (BY-06)(sold separately). to almost any wall surface - no cutting holes or pulling wire, with a wall mount bracket. Replace existing 3-way switches by mounting the bracket and Pico over the backbox

【Just link to the Amazon Echo in one step】: No complicated WIFI app settings are required. Just turn on the power and shout to ALEXA ECHO: discover new devices, automatically discover and install them. You can immediately control the mobile phone APP (alexa app) and voice control. Solve the privacy disclosure problem of third-party APP installation.

customer_reviews.review_snippet: Purchased to allow remotely dimming/turning off lights from bed. Paired immediately and works great. I've had other name brands that struggled to cooperate.
